website_summaries.verdict: While this ball won't live up to expectations for serious competition, it's a great pick for young beginners, backyard play, and parents who appreciate the low price.
pros: Earns praise for being a durable ball at a surprisingly low price
Kids love the cool graphics that they say looks great on the field
cons: Not "official" size – size 4 in particular has been reported to run small
Comes deflated, but it's fairly easy to inflate with a basic air pump

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth soccer ball within two years as I either loose them or their stitches fall apart. Initially, I was skeptical of how this ball will feel/handle on wet grass as it felt quite smooth (almost slippery to hold). But almost after it's first use, I have fully enjoyed it as it holds air well, the outer surface doesn't get rough, works well in rain and on wet grass, feel good to handle and has good control. Quick tip: though it came with air and great packaging (as it's displayed in shops), I thought it needed more air as I felt soft, but I was wrong...and had to take extra air that I pumped out again.
customer_reviews.author: I.Orm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball for dogs. The exterior isn't hard (like a Jolly ball), and they are able to pick it up and not puncture it with their teeth or claws. It goes without saying that since it's a soccer ball, it is easy to kick far, which the dogs love since it becomes a good chase. I didn't have any of the quality issues some other buyers mentioned in their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ball for the beautiful game
customer_reviews.text: The Glider II is a great soccer ball. We've had three of them (one stolen): black/green, green/black, and white/black. The style is almost like a pokeball, so that is cool. It is a very distinctively styled ball, not unlike the Brazuca during the 2014 World Cup. The coaches love to use the ball for some reason and everyone knows whose ball it is. It's just cool. Style is important to soccer players, but functionally it is a very good ball. The cover is very sturdy and it takes daily use and abuse, both indoors and out. Because it is pretty unique, it's easy to find the ball after matches, practices, etc. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Pescatrice

customer_reviews.title: Just an OK ball
customer_reviews.text: This is just an OK ball. It's very obvious that this is a replica ball. The ball itself is very slick and will skip across surfaces. I am hoping that eventually the ball with get "rough" and be able to not skip across surfaces. I have used this ball on turf surfaces indoors and outdoors. Even when it was fully inflated, it felt very light like it would fly through the air too fast. I will edit this in a few weeks if anything changes with this ball, but I am not hopeful that it will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Miniature Soccer Ball !
customer_reviews.text: This miniature soccer ball is a great gift for serious fans, people introducing soccer to small children and in my case, a dog who is serious about soccer. It is very solid and well made. We enjoy hours of kicking the ball around in the backyard. The ball is solid and doesn't require any inflation. It is glossy and a nice collectors item. However, if you choose to kick it around then it will experience normal wear and tear. My 56 pound dog carries her ball around with her and it still looks great despite a few teeth marks. I have one soccer ball for her to use inside the house and one for the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: SherryAva

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly round
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it is a design flaw or we just got a defective ball but our ball never actually achieved “round”. Near round is the best we got to. I inflated the ball very slowly as I was taught to do many years ago and inflated to the correct psi range but the ball never got passed oblong. Instead of rolling, it jumps and wobbles. I tried deflating and starting over several times. I tried over inflating and under inflating and although it got better than the initial fill, it is still not round. Perhaps it is the different size patches that make it incapable of becoming completely round or maybe I just got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Miller

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last three months!
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for 3 1/2 months. I don't think it ever held air very well. We had to fill it almost every time my daughter played. Now tonight, we tried to fill it and the black rubber piece that you stick the metal needle in fell through to the inside of the ball! Now there's a huge hole where the black rubber thing was, and there's no way to use it. Very disappointed. Now she's without a ball for her tournament this tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: tiner77

customer_reviews.title: The right price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: These balls were add on items and they were a great price. I got four of them because I started coaching U8 soccer. I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on balls let me get ruined or actually find their way home with one of my players, these were a perfect fit. We are only halfway through the season and they’ve held up great, they’ve even used them as the game ball on a couple occasions. I would recommend this to any soccer coach.
customer_reviews.author: Adam T.

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for my kid, deflates as it should!
customer_reviews.text: Received ball in perfect condition, deflated... as it should be!!! Anyone who has ever played soccer- YOU WANT A QUALITY BALL THAT DEFLATES OVER TIME. If the ball doesn’t deflate, it’s plastic or of poor quality that will be painful to use. It will hurt your child’s foot, body or head when he or she kicks or contacts it. Your child will not enjoy playing with a poor quality ball although it may seem more durable and less work because you don’t have to pump it occasionally. Buy a small ball pump and a needle, it’ll be worth it and your kid will be happier with the softer more inflatable ball that isn’t painful and won’t cause injury.
customer_reviews.author: TDutts10

customer_reviews.title: Leaked when put air in
customer_reviews.text: Being realistic, you get what you pay for. I purchased 2 as practice balls in the yard and not for games or team practices. One of the balls leaked at about 2 psi while you were pumping up. I returned both because they seem to be slightly smaller than official Size 4 balls. If you still decide to purchase them keep in mind that they come deflated. Since I have a pump and pressure gauge I didn't care.
customer_reviews.author: StantonFF

customer_reviews.title: Great ball - comes deflated
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I didn’t realize it would come needing to be inflated, so we had to go out and buy a pump. Just want to give folks fair warning that you’ll need to inflate the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good at First
customer_reviews.text: When I got this and inflated it for the first time I was very happy with the quality of the ball! It felt good to kick, not too sticky and not too slick. The problem arose about a month after using it every other day when it stopped holding air. It's not going to be a long lasting product if you play a lot and the people I play with all have pretty strong legs so they really smack the ball. I would probably recommend skipping on this ball and going for something more durable, even if it means spending a bit more money.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Good ball. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Got this ball for our kids (ages: 12f, 14m, & 15m). It has a smooth skin, like other medium grade balls. It has stayed inflated, and has been a good ball. The ball is being used by someone in our family at least 4-5 days a week, and seems to be doing as expected. It does have a small tear from a pebble from being bounced on the sidewalk. Kids prefer the blue ball over the yellow and red ball. Would recommend. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Family of 11

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Hold Air Well
customer_reviews.text: I will give it 2 stars because my 7-yr old son loved it, but it stopped holding air, literally 30 days after I bought it and I just missed the window to exchange it for a new one. That's not cool. Adidas should make a higher quality product that lasts more than a month. It looks good and feels good, but the bladder is no good. I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hall

customer_reviews.title: Operation Christmas Child - Shoebox Info
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this soccer ball for a shoebox gift, because I read online from some of the international workers on the receiving end that the completely flat balls do not hold up. I was glad to see this had positive reviews and that it wasn't fully inflated. So as a reference point - it isn't fully inflated, but because it is a good soccer ball it isn't flat either. If sending it in a shoe box, you'll need a deeper shoe box in order for it to fit. I was still able to fit in other items around it, including the air pump I purchased. But there isn't room for other large items.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia Fine

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It wasnt pumped up when it came so I was happy I had purchased a pump to go with it & was able to try it out! We saw 2 other kids using this style of ball on our team (we have the white with pink & they had the orange with silver) and about 2 other people,with the same color but from,other schools. It's a nice ball.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynM

customer_reviews.title: Unique design!
customer_reviews.text: I like the unique design of the ball. The stripes wear out quite quickly and even though i've only used it for indoor soccer. Also it got slightly misshapen after a few uses (oblong). Otherwise it bounces and does what a soccer ball is supposed to do after I kick it (go in the net) :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Dolezal

customer_reviews.title: Split apart after less then one month!
customer_reviews.text: In less then ONE month this ball is junk! We did NOT over inflate it. And yet during practice it split! Very disappointed! I could understand if it was along a seam - but in the middle of TWO areas?? And of course it is past the official return time. So very disappointed with this Adidas size 5 soccer ball. Worse yet - my son now has to do without a ball to practice with at home for the rest of his soccer season!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie L Durbin

customer_reviews.title: The ball is ok for the price. Got it ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball is ok for the price. Got it the other day and pumped it up for my son. No problem holding air, however the ball is not a true size 5 ball. I measured the ball and it was a smidge less than 26.5" in circumference. I also bought the adidas Performance Tango Glider Soccer Ball and I measured that ball, and it was 27" for a size 5. The adidas Performance Tango Glider Soccer Ball was also about $5 cheaper (bought it for $15.39). Other than that, the ball is decent, however I probably wouldn't buy the ball again for the price relative to the expected size.
customer_reviews.author: Ktran

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer ball for everyone on the team
customer_reviews.text: I'm a coach and a few years back decided to give soccer balls instead of trophies at the end of the season. It's the biggest hit ever with kids and parents! At the end-of season party I hand out a ball to each kid, share about them, and give them each a nickname based on their playing style. Then we pass sharpies around and all the kids sign each others' soccer balls. It's the best way to end a season!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni K.

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Not inflated
customer_reviews.text: Ball is great! Arrived today. I would have given it 5 stars but it arrived in a plastic bag not inflated. I had previously read reviews that stated it was inflated, but that was not the case. Over all great ball. When inflated to the proper psi/bar it has a great feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a size 5--and received a size 4--which I didn't notice until we had used it for a few days. The ball didn't hold air well--with consistent temperature and weather--and didn't stand up to use well. After only a month, the ball had a couple of "chips" in the material and seams were pulling. It was being used by a 12 year old girl--and occasionally as one of many team balls during a practice.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This ball lasted about 2 days. It got a rip in the outside material on day one, and by day two, it was spewing the styrofoam inners all over the place
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Greenstein

customer_reviews.title: This was a good purchase for the price (almost $10)
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase for the price (almost $10). I bought it for my cousin's kid who plays football in school. He loves it and uses it daily. It came deflated and was still a little soft after using a manual pump. The compressor fixed that though but be careful with compressors as they can over-inflate or damage the ball easily. The quality is not as impressive as the 2016 MLS Glider that I bought although that is a size 1. However, this ball delivers and was too good of an offer to pass by. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Balram

customer_reviews.title: You had two jobs and you failed at half of them
customer_reviews.text: 1) Be Round - PASS 2) Hold Air - FAIL!!! I pumped the ball up and 24 hours later it was flat. I pumped it up again just before a game for warm up and it was soft before I the whistle. It's a simple product. I don't know if it's a failure of QC or the seller is intentionally trying to offload rejects. Either way i returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ball!!! Keeps air well, rolls great, my 9 year old loves it!! Great quality! Would definitely purchase again - and we buy soccer balls all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Everest

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bunch of these for a youth league and am very happy! They have a nice soft touch and hold air well. They also don’t feel like plastic which can be tough to find at this price point. If we could get the same price I ordered them at I would get a bunch more.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S

customer_reviews.title: Received deflated ball!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this purchase! The ball was deflated and squeezed into a narrow box!!! Nowhere in the description did it say the ball would not arrive inflated. Amazon couldn’t have found a big enough box?? I don’t have tools to inflate the ball so how is my son going to use this for soccer? I will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Came deflated, damaged and FILTHY! SHAME ON THIS SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: Disgraceful! I don’t know how this ball is a top seller! It came deflated and FILTHY absolutely disgraceful! My 4 YO is about to start soccer & this ball matched his cleats perfectly. What an absolute disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear36

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed... used?
customer_reviews.text: First, it came uniflated. Which is fine, I guess, but there was no packaging, and there are several patches of residue like several stickers are missing. If I pay for a new ball, I expect a new ball. VERY disappointed. That said, it's a soccer ball, it appears to hold its air, and works as a soccer ball. So I'll keep it, but it's getting one star.
customer_reviews.author: Modred189

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this ball for several weeks now and we are very pleased with it. Great color, really stands out amongst the other balls. Comes inflated which is a huge bonus! It has not lost any air pressure.
customer_reviews.author: LJG

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a stylish addias soccer ball!!
customer_reviews.text: My son had really wanted a near-professional soccer ball. We looked at dozens and when he sawthis one svc read the description--he had to have it!!! It's been lots if fun. My son plays around with it often. He doesn't really leave his side. The ball is a bright orange and has maintained its air after months of use. Itsgot a good bounce too. Definitely a great gift fur your soccer player or fan!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We used this ball for four practices and after that it wouldn’t stay inflated. Every week I had to put air in it. It is easy to inflate, but don’t recommend it unless you don’t mind inflating it every week. My son is only 4 so he’s not hard on the ball. I expected it to last a lot longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Jakell

customer_reviews.title: Soft cover not hard & shiny...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ball with a nice soft touch. Not a shiny super smooth cover like some other balls. This has a matte finished leather that creates a nice touch for added control. Using it for indoor soccer and it is great. Probably wouldn't stand up to being kicked around to on pavement but works great on grass and turf.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Balls should be round
customer_reviews.text: First ball I received, lopsided. Amazon is great with returns, had a new one at my house in two days. Lopsided again. Pretty disappointed in Adidas. I'm an avid Adidas fanatic, but chances of two balls being lopsided, pretty slim, unless you started making inferior products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: We do the Operations Christmas box every year and this year we wanted to gift some sporting goods, specifically Soccer gear to the boy who’d be receiving our box. This comes deflated, which is what we needed to fit into the shoebox. With that being said, I can’t speak for how the product is inflated or with use... but as it arrived it looked like a great quaility ball. My kids were jealous it wasn’t for them!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Janeiro

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap ball
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty okay ball in terms of material, you'd really have to rip it on the turf to get the stickiness off, but the padding and strike quality is definitely good. I like having them for practices just to have balls but it will never be a game ball.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rausenberger

customer_reviews.title: Durable, High Visabilty ball that looks beautiful on the grass.
customer_reviews.text: Ball is great! Beautiful color on field. It is more orange than red which is sweet. It looks like fire! It’s size seems slight and I meant very very slight smaller that my other Addidas size 4 balls. Over all a good purchase. DURABLE
customer_reviews.author: WalshOffices

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Visible in green grass and unique design. Soccer season is over. Sad to say....it got lost in the mix. Two seasons of soccer. Two lost soccer balls. Putting a name on the ball just isn't enough. Good ball and great value.
customer_reviews.author: peraltna

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this “flight” ball
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this “flight” ball. I remember these being really popular in the late 90s early 00s for their durability. They weigh less than a traditional game ball, so they’re great for practices and just kicking it with friends. Super cheap too. 100% authentic Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived deflated and lumpy
customer_reviews.text: It's ridiculous it arrived deflated. Now I've got to track down a pump. First world problems I guess but when you read others reviews and see the pictures, the majority arrived as a normal, inflated, ball. It would be nice to know from the listing what the probability of getting a deflated one is. Unfortunate and inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Bomb Ball
customer_reviews.text: We got this ball for my son's birthday and he loves it! He calls it the Bomb Ball. He plays U-10 soccer and this ball was used in several games and served nicely. I really wouldn't expect anything less from Adidas. I am only taking one star off because this ball does not do well with wet grass, it is super slippery on throw ins if the thrower is not wearing gloves. The goalie had no problems because he was wearing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Colby

customer_reviews.title: My son has this ball from a different seller. ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has this ball from a different seller. This was described as having the same matetial and specs as his previous ball. However, this ball is made of a shiny plastic matetial and is not the same quality product as described. The previous ball was made of a much more durable material and much bettet quality. This ball is much lower quality. Very disappoinng.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Tiny hole...  the ball looked beautiful, doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ball for my 8 year old son. I inflated it and looked really nice, he loved it. He practiced with it in our small backyard, and found that the ball didn’t have enough air in it. We inflated it again, and again in a couple of days, again, again, again. My husband checked the ball thoroughly and found a tiny hole.... Okay, that’s why. What a waste of money. Im wondering if the way they deliver (flatten ball) gave the balls the damage. Because it’s our second ball ordering the ball from Amazon. The other one doesn’t keep the air long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of three boys

customer_reviews.title: Took a good beating and never lost air pressure.
customer_reviews.text: but! Many mixed reviews about deflating balls but my 8 year old had no issues and he beat the hell out of that ball practicing this past soccer season at his school. The whole team used it to practice and the ball never lost a pound of pressure. Adidas is certainly a quality brand name you can trust.
customer_reviews.author: ATLANTISVIP

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I ordered it on March 21st and got it March 27th. I just got this in the mail today and it was inflated and wrapped in plastic... nothing protecting it. I took the plastic off and there’s a hole in the ball!!! I’m pissed. Now I can’t use it for my soccer practices. Would not recommend buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn

customer_reviews.title: This ball has really held up well. Other balls ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball has really held up well. Other balls in this price range get screwed up or egg shaped, but this has been great
customer_reviews.author: Relaxed Max

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 3 ball and it’s nice and small for a child to play with. It looks nice and it plays well, I haven’t had issues with it yet and hopefully that will remain the case.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Good in the field, not on the driveway
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for the money. My son loves it. Just note: it is not durable on pavement or cement. This ball is best used on the field.
customer_reviews.author: Skinner

customer_reviews.title: My son's friend loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for one of my son's best friends. Like all Adidas Gliders, this is a quality ball. The graphics are cool and it holds up under a lot of practice and play. Very happy, as always, with the Glider balls.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Pescatrice

customer_reviews.title: Ball moves when my son kicks it!
customer_reviews.text: My son selected this soccer ball after looking at several options. He liked the colors and pattern of this one. It arrived deflated for shipping purposes, which was unexpected but not a problem. Functionally, the ball moves when he kicks it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Comes deflated but is overall a pretty cool ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 yr olds first season of soccer and have no complaints. Came deflated, wish I would have known that but it's no big so we just picked up a cheap manual pump from the store to inflate it. He loves that he's the only one with a non standard looking ball and loves that he picked it out.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good shape, had to inflate myself, but that was understood, decent overall quality size 3 soccer ball for my nephew!
customer_reviews.text: Picked this ball up for my young nephew and was happy with the quality for the price I paid. Arrived deflated, but I knew this going in & it didn't matter because in my opinion if you're going to own sports balls you should also own a way to properly inflate them as well. The balls stitching seems fine, it holds air on its own and bounces like it should. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: The soccer ball is flat. When I ordered the soccer ball it did not say anything about it being flat I have no way of pumping up now I have to purchase something else the pump the ball up
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Solid ball - got it on sale for $10-$13 I ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid ball - got it on sale for $10-$13 I think. Worth it. We have a foot golf course in our area and I wanted my own ball for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The first ball broke upon first air fill (air spot fell into the ball leaving a hole) but we contacted Amazon and had another ball re sent to us.
customer_reviews.author: Miss CC

customer_reviews.title: Durable and dependable at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to replace worn soccer balls for my soccer tournament team. The balls have now been used for a few months as game balls and they are holding up week. Looks to be durable and seem to hold up well. No major issues. Would recommend highly if you are looking for durable balls.
customer_reviews.author: Davenstein

customer_reviews.title: Durable and possibly dog proof
customer_reviews.text: My dog chewed it up a bit but could not puncture it. Though I was sad about the bite marks, I was surprised to see how durable this ball is. It has a nice thick layer. I still use it. I don't recommend letting your dog bite it though.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice in size 3. Nice feel to it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Nice feel to it. Holds air. Seems to be well worth buying. I bought size 3 for my nephew to play with at age 2. Something he can grow up playing with for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mark @ Brew's

customer_reviews.title: Love these soccer balls
customer_reviews.text: I got these on deal of the day. For the price, these are fantastic balls. They hold up well even when rolled in melting snow and ice during the winter months. We own three of them and they have all held up way better than the nike ball we have. Just the right weight and allows great foot skill training.
customer_reviews.author: Picky CO Mom

customer_reviews.title: Size 1 is Great for my 2 y.o.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for my 2 y.o. who loves it (Size 1/“mini”). It responds slightly different than the other size 1 ball we had (this one doesn’t bounce as high and feels a little denser, but not much). Also, it comes inflated, which is great since it doesn’t have a hole through which you can inflate it on your own. Hopefully it stays inflated for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Raaj

customer_reviews.title: Score More Goals with This Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and functional. My daughter loves the way this soccer ball looks. She practices all the time with it and it's held up. It doesn't actually help you score more goals, but she definitely practices more with this cute ball.
customer_reviews.author: rayshobes21

customer_reviews.title: Not giftable.
customer_reviews.text: I see others received their ball inflated and in an adidas box. This was supposed to be a gift for my son. It was received half inflated and in a plastic tied up bag. This is not giftable. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny Rae

customer_reviews.title: Halfway Inflated
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my grandson as a gift. Was a disappointment to receive like that and a disappointment to give. Otherwise, the ball is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Avoid purchasing from here.
customer_reviews.text: Ball had a very strong smoke odor, it made the whole room smell! It’s been a few days now of keeping the ball outside to hopefully degas it but odor remains. Ball did not come in any type of packaging just in a plastic bag, seems possible to be a knockoff/counterfeit product. I’ll look to purchase a ball somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaSteve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soccerball
customer_reviews.text: My son chose this one but I didn’t realize it didn’t go with a pump and it was deflated. So just keep in mind you will need to pump it up. I just used a bike pump that had a needle with it. But so far, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: vhatt

customer_reviews.title: Size 3 is small
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 3 but it’s small. Like for a 5yr old my 8 yr old needs a bigger ball but this is pretty and nice sturdy and we will get good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Tough and sturdy amazing ball
customer_reviews.text: Amazing my sons 11 20 25 all used it and had amazing feel easily took hard shots curve is good and you can hit it cleanly
customer_reviews.author: Muriel Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Punctured on grass and turf practice
customer_reviews.text: The ball is soft and feels great. But quality, especially inside air balloon quality, is not so great. It got micro punctured within two month of practice on grass and turf. It holds air if inflated but slowly gets deflated over time. I'd buy more durable product than this next time.
customer_reviews.author: Otabek Shukurov

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't air up
customer_reviews.text: This came partially deflated. I had purchased an electric air pump from Amazon also to go with it, it wouldn't air up the ball. I tried using a manual air pump and that didn't work either. Save your money and purchase a ball that already comes fully inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: No longer holds air!
customer_reviews.text: I was very careful to lubricate the needle when airing it up, never overinflated. This was my sons back up soccer ball which was seldomly used. It didnt last 3 months! Now it's past the return window. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ball is Life
customer_reviews.text: Looks like some come boxed and some deflated (maybe by color?) - but I ordered the white with green accents, it came deflated - pumped it up and looks like a globe (not egg), retains air, and is able to be kicked around. Just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Adidas is best by far
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this ball, out of about 6 different brands of soccer balls for my high school team including Nike, Adidas are the only ones who have held up for more than 2 seasons
customer_reviews.author: Warinners

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is awesome! It stayed full of air the full season despite the beating it took and looks unique and is a great value. We got a lot of compliments. Despite being a white color it doesn’t get dirty at all in grass/ outdoor soccer. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KAITLYN TINSLEY

customer_reviews.title: The was pooped
customer_reviews.text: It was vey bad the colors were good but the ball air kept coming out it’s not worth $40 wish could get another one or get my refund
customer_reviews.author: cupertino antonio

customer_reviews.title: Comes deflated
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed, comes deflated and in a junky plastic bag knotted on top. Guess I thought it would come in a box inflated. Giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper A

customer_reviews.title: Comes Deflated
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Christmas , it comes deflated. Had to find someone to blow it up for me. Wouldn’t have been a problem if I we were home for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: shannon dimauro

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for 6 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball for my 6 year old son. It is the perfect size for him. Also my 3 year old uses it too. The material and feeling of the ball is great because it doesn't have a plastic feel to it. It came already inflated and is still inflated just as much when I bought it, which it is now a few months after purchase. It seems to be very sturdy and holds up well to my children playing really rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Find
customer_reviews.text: My son and I never lose the ball when he is out in the field of kids and soccer balls!! ...bright and cool looking...Great ball!
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level ball
customer_reviews.text: The first ball I received would not inflate. However, I was able to return it for a new one, and the new one has been great for my four-year-old to kick around the back yard and get used to the idea of playing soccer. I can't speak to durability, as we have not used it extensively, and my son's kicks are not super hard. But, it appears to be a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Julia G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: Be warned! This ball looks like is was used and just replaced in the cardboard packaging. There are what look to be shoe scuff marks all over the ball, very disappointed this was suppose to be a gift and for the price I will return it and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Good soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought for nephews and they use it all the time to practice. They like it and it has held air for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Tasia Rains

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice soft feel, great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Most balls for children have a hard, plastic feel, but this one doesn't. Don't know yet whether it will hold air in the long-run, but A+ thus far
customer_reviews.author: Tor Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Nice ball. The panels usually pull up in the corners pretty quick but this one seems to hold up to the kids abuse. They leave it outside in the weather all the time but it still looks pretty new after several months.
customer_reviews.author: CerchOne

customer_reviews.title: Halfway decent ball.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in late July 2018. t's been a great ball fir my son, a Varaity soccer player, until last night when it tore open while kicking it against a soccer rebounder during practice.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible and defective after three soccer practices
customer_reviews.text: This size 5 product is terrible and defective after three soccer practices, it does not hold air. I have been a soccer coach for over 15 years and I bought this for my youngest. Doesn't hold air and is a total piece of junk, I should be refunded my money and am looking to amazon to make this right. I have purchased size 4 soccer balls without any problem from amazon in the past and this size 5 ball is defective and terrible.
customer_reviews.author: The Kelley’s

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a regular soccer ball. We bought it thinking it was a useable soccer ball. It’s really small. I have it five stars because we should have looked at the description and it is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Rickman

customer_reviews.title: This ball looks just as awesome in real life as it does in the picture
customer_reviews.text: This ball looks just as awesome in real life as it does in the picture. I never actually kicked it around because I gave it to my friend who loves soccer, but I imagine he made good use of it. He is pretty honest and didn't complain about it which makes me believe it is serving him well.
customer_reviews.author: Leon St. Corsa

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than a standard size 4 ball, closer to a size 3. lopsided when completely inflated. This is my 3rd issue with Adidas balls, the previous 2 had slow leaks and this one is too small for its size. I'll go back to buying Nike and Puma balls.
customer_reviews.author: C. Albanese

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and nice look!
customer_reviews.text: A favorite on the field. Good quality ball and the kids love the design. Came partially inflated so a little bit more air and we were good to go. Has held up to swarms of 8 year old kicking it and sitting on it. 😂
customer_reviews.author: MomP

customer_reviews.title: Not Bulldog safe-kid sage tho!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dog. But it's a bit cushiony and he chewed the cover up playing w it. Did not work well for that. Great for kids tho
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Cute ball for my little 7 year old, but the stitching is coming out in a couple of places, with her being so little and not a strong kicker, it's ok, but now way could this ball stand up to a more powerful kicker.
customer_reviews.author: dlkligora

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool but likely won't last
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool but feels like it will start falling apart after a season or two. Just not made to endure any more.
customer_reviews.author: PRK12975

customer_reviews.title: Simple look, nice feel
customer_reviews.text: It's a ball. The weight feels right, the texture allows for a familiar level of grip, and the elasticity is consistent. The seems don't all look completely consistent, but I'd expect it to hold up for a season of play.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth a durril

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Has lasted 3 months! Still perfect
customer_reviews.text: We love this ball! I waited a few months to see how it would stand against my 8 year old and 11 year old and their friends. It still looks great!! Highly recommended! A better choice if your kids are going to play with the ball because it’s white. Beyond the durability the boys all said they liked how it felt to kick it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchm12678

customer_reviews.title: Bad shape
customer_reviews.text: Really dissapointed. This ball shape isnt a perfect round shape. Since it came defleted not after puting air on it it just doesnt look or feel right. Wont buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ball, probably better than the Adidas Capitano
customer_reviews.text: For less than $18, it is a solid buy - so I got four of them! Compared with the yellow Capitano (which we also like a lot), this one was slightly preferred. It felt a tad more premium.
customer_reviews.author: SMF317

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ball
customer_reviews.text: This a beautiful ball! I liked the uniqueness of this ball since many have similar balls. The colors are awesome, and the quality is on point.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Green

customer_reviews.title: Comes inflated
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product. We have gifted these as well and kids love them. Perfect size for two year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Will probably by more!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for twins and they loved them and he remarked I had The appropriate size. They were made well and loved the bright colors. I didn't realize till I bought them there were different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda4

product_meta.title: adidas Confederations Cup Glider Soccer Ball
product_meta.description: Standing out with bold graphics, this soccer ball's durable build makes it ideal for developing your skills. The tough TPU cover has been machine stitched for longevity while its rubber bladder gives it a soft touch and response for controlled play.
feature_bullets: A hard-wearing ball that keeps bouncing back
Rubber bladder for best air retention
Size 5 ball (official size) suggested for ages 12+

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
